entry.title: Binance Data Including Code, Internal Passwords Leaked on GitHub: Report
entry.summary: The leaked information reportedly included details on Binance's security measures, llike passwords and multi-factor authentication.

entry.title: Bitcoin 'Power Law' Predicts $1 Million BTC Price by 2033—Here's How It Works
entry.summary: Bitcoin's price is a "force of nature" that scales over time much like a city, according to this astrophysicist. Will this "power law" hold up?

entry.title: Why Is Everyone Talking About Jupiter on Solana?
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains why the crypto world can't stop talking about Solana's Jupiter. What is JUP? Who qualified for the airdrop? And will there be another round?

entry.title: GME Crash: GameStop Tribute Meme Coin on Solana Plunges 52%
entry.summary: Just like the meme stock of the same name, the GME tribute coin based on GameStop is falling hard after this week’s spikes.

entry.title: 'Probably Will Go Meme': OPNX Investors Refuse to Sell Tokens Despite Shutdown
entry.summary: "What are the chances they can fail again," one OPNX investors asked. "It’s almost statistically impossible."

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Ends Week Up 2%, PYTH Gains 15% on Binance Listing
entry.summary: Bitcoin ended the week up slightly after a strong U.S. jobs report dashed remaining hopes the Fed will drop interest rates in March.

entry.title: How to Farm the Aevo Airdrop on Ethereum
entry.summary: Aevo, an Ethereum decentralized perpetual futures and options exchange, announced an airdrop program this week. Here's how to make the most of it.

entry.title: You Can Play Games Like 'Doom' on Bitcoin and Dogecoin—Here’s What That Means
entry.summary: Legendary games like Pac-Man and Tetris are running on Bitcoin and beyond, but what does that even mean? Here’s what you need to know.

entry.title: This Hidden New AI Model From Google Beats OpenAI's Dall-E and MidJourney—For Free
entry.summary: Tucked behind a drop-down menu in Google’s suite of AI tools, ImageFX makes photorealistic, high quality images —and even gives you suggestions to improve them. See how it compares against its rivals.

entry.title: Bipartisan Lawmakers Seek to Repeal SEC Crypto Accounting Policy
entry.summary: Senator Cynthia Lummis and Representatives Wiley Nickel and Mike Flood introduced a joint resolution to repeal SEC Staff Accounting Bill 121.

entry.title: $4.2 Million Worth of Stolen XRP Tokens Frozen on Binance
entry.summary: It's good news, but there's still a lot of funds missing. The exploiter made off with $113 million worth of XRP.

entry.title: Grand Jury Indicts Hackers Linked to $400 Million Stolen from FTX
entry.summary: Three Americans have been charged with orchestrating the massive attack on the failed cryptocurrency exchange.

entry.title: From NFT Punchline to $8 Million Raise, ‘Pixelmon’ Preps for MON Token Launch
entry.summary: Kevin lives! Under new ownership and with fresh funding, Pixelmon is ready to roll out games and debut its MON-powered IP protocol.

entry.title: OPNX, the Crypto Exchange From the Founders of Bankrupt Three Arrows Capital, Is Shutting Down
entry.summary: Pitched as a "home for those harmed by crypto crises," the Open Exchange prepares to meet its own demise.

entry.title: Andrew Tate Disavowed Crypto—Now He's Pitching His Own Coin
entry.summary: The "most famous man alive" had his Bitcoin seized, but is mulling minting his own token.

entry.title: Larry David Lost Money on FTX Too—An 'Idiot' for Doing the Ad, He Says
entry.summary: Comedian Larry David admits regret for doing that Super Bowl ad for FTX—and wouldn't mind getting in on the class action lawsuit against him and other celebs.

entry.title: Jupiter Founder Brushes Off Airdrop Backlash: 'People Don’t Understand Anything'
entry.summary: The pseudonymous Meow isn’t bothered by the ‘FUD,” and says crypto influencers crying foul “only understand buy/sell.”

entry.title: Collapsed Genesis Agrees to Settle SEC’s Earn Lawsuit for $21M
entry.summary: The SEC hit the failed crypto lender with a lawsuit last January, calling its Gemini Earn product a security.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Mint for Quantum Cats Delayed Again—What's Going On?
entry.summary: Technical issues push back the highly awaited Taproots Wizard NFT mint for a second time.

entry.title: Bitcoin Billionaire Arthur Hayes: It's Time to ‘Get Back on the Solana Train’
entry.summary: The respected crypto authority predicts a significant rally for Solana (SOL) amid brewing banking sector challenges.

entry.title: Jupiter Founder Meow Unloads on the Solana Airdrop 'FUD'
entry.summary: Meow, the pseudonymous founder of Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter, made a surprise appearance today on Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to address the JUP airdrop "FUD," and explain why he believes the backlash to the team's launch liquidity pool is unfounded.

entry.title: ‘Overwatch’ Esports League Bans Crypto, NFT, and AI Sponsors
entry.summary: Blizzard’s new Overwatch Champions Series says “no thanks” to esports teams that have crypto and AI sponsors.

entry.title: El Salvador Will Race Ahead With Bitcoin Plans If Bukele Wins Reelection
entry.summary: El Salvador president Nayib Bukele is set to win Sunday's election, polls say. And if he does, he'll continue with his Bitcoin push.

entry.title: Polygon Labs Cuts 60 Staff in Ethereum Scaler's Latest Shakeup
entry.summary: The company behind Ethereum scaling network Polygon has laid off 19% of its team, less than a year after an even larger layoff.

entry.title: Mutant Ape Game 'Serum City' Launches—How to Claim an Ethereum NFT Pass
entry.summary: City-builder game Serum City is now live, and holders of Bored Ape NFTs and more can claim a free Ethereum access pass.

entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Jason from Holograph.xyz
They dive into the multichain future and what that means for NFTs, DeFi, RWAs, and more.

entry.title: 'Parallel' Teases Open Beta Plans as New Ethereum NFT Cards Launch
entry.summary: GG’s 2023 Game of the Year debuts new NFT cards with the Season 1 battle pass—and the Parallel open beta launch is coming soon.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Dencun Upgrade: Technical Overview and Potential Market Impact
entry.summary: Dencun introduces "proto-danksharding" to Ethereum, aiming to decrease transaction costs for layer-2 blockchains and address scalability.

entry.title: Binance Launches In-App Bitcoin Inscriptions Marketplace for BRC-20 Tokens
entry.summary: The Binance Inscriptions Marketplace provides a "one-stop solution" within the Binance Web3 Wallet for Bitcoin BRC-20 tokens such as ORDI.

entry.title: Most New Ethereum Tokens Appear to Be Pump and Dumps—But There's Good News
entry.summary: The potentially scammy tokens only represented 1.3% of DEX volume in 2023, suggesting only a small number of traders fall for them, according to a Chainalysis report.

entry.title: US Ramps Up Monitoring of Crypto Miners' Energy Use
entry.summary: The Energy Information Administration will track U.S. crypto miners' energy consumption following an “emergency collection of data request.”

entry.title: 'Fortnite' Fail: Epic Games Scrambles to Remove Racist AI-Generated Images
entry.summary: Developer Epic Games is working to purge user-created islands with imagery depicting racist stereotypes, apparently generated by AI tools.

entry.title: AI Is Key to Microsoft’s Blockbuster Growth, Quarterly Earnings Show
entry.summary: Logging a staggering 30% growth in Azure and a 49% increase in gaming revenue, Microsoft's AI strategy is paying off.

entry.title: Inject Botox Where? Twitter Weighs In On Billionaire Biohacker's New Penis Plan
entry.summary: Bryan Johnson's latest venture in his longevity mission is Botox injections for erectile enhancement.

entry.summary: Early access for a mobile augmented reality game based on "Hunger Games" is causing a frenzy among the crypto kids.

entry.title: This Bitcoin DeFi Exchange Wants to Save You From Hacks
entry.summary: Swapping BTC for other crypto is risky. Flush with new cash, San Francisco-based Portal wants to put your mind at ease.

entry.summary: Jupiter is seeing surging trading action amid the JUP airdrop on Solana—and it’s way ahead of Ethereum’s Uniswap V3.

entry.title: Argentina President Javier Milei Drops Crypto Tax Plan
entry.summary: Argentine President Javier Milei has rewritten the country’s sweeping reform bill and jettisoned crypto amidst debate over more fundamental issues.

entry.title: How Generative AI Makes for a More Inclusive Metaverse in 'Avalon'
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson about the use of generative AI within the upcoming game and how it will help players from anywhere and everywhere truly see themselves represented in the online world.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Are you the one being farmed? w/ Frisson

Reza is joined by Frisson from Tallyx.xyz

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman
entry.summary: Qualcomm product marketing manager Matthew Grossman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why mobile esports is exploding in popularity around the world—and dispels some of the misconceptions around mobile gaming.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.
